info: To create one, choose the 'Cygnus Knights' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach Lv. 10 and Ereve. You will see 5 NPCs on the left after talking to Neinheart. Talk to Mihile to become a Dawn Warrior

Primary Trio

  • 2 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)

credits: Boost Nodes Build + Hyper Passive Build + Inner Ability

extraContent.title: Solar/Luna Stances & Cosmic Skills
extraContent.content:
Dawn Warrior has 2 stances - Solar and Luna. Both stances are unlocked in 1st Job and have separate skill sets. In 2nd Job, Equinox Cycle is unlocked that automatically alternates between Solar and Luna stances while using attacks from each stance

Rising Sun - Solar Stance (1st Job): Increases %Final Damage and provides increased Attack Speed

Falling Moon - Luna Stance (1st Job): Increases %Crit Rate and doubles number of attacks dealt, however reduces your %Final Damage

Equinox Cycle (2nd Job): Automatically alternates between stances after attacking in one stance

  • In 4th Job, the effects from both stances are applied together while Equinox Cycle is active

In 1st Job, Soul Element is unlocked that generates a resource called 'Cosmic Orbs' when landing an Solar/Luna attack opposite stance of the previously successful attack. Cosmic Orbs are used to activate 'Cosmic' skills and for each Cosmic Orb, consumed empowers the skill. Below is a list of all Cosmic skills:

  • Cosmic Matter - 2nd Job
  • Cosmic Shower - 3rd Job
  • Cosmic Burst - 4th Job
  • Cosmos - 5th Job

primary.name: Elemental Slash
primary.shortDesc: Damage: 130%, Max Enemies Hit: 3, Max Hits: 1

primary.name: Imperial Recall
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, return to Ereve immediately.\nCooldown: 600 sec.

primary.name: Noble Mind
primary.shortDesc: Increases Empress's Blessing max level by 6
details: This skill is leveled up by completing quests from Neinheart after Lv. 125

primary.name: Elemental Harmony
primary.shortDesc: Strength increases 1 for every 2 levels the character gains

primary.name: Elemental Expert
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power and Magic ATT: +10%

primary.name: Elemental Shift
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 4, jumps further in the appropriate direction
details: Can be activated by pressing jump twice
While in the air, pressing the Up Arrow and Jump Key will perform a vertical jump

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Attack Power and Magic ATT: + 4%, Duration: 40 min
details: Affects all nearby players
Has a cooldown (2 hrs)

primary.name: Rising Sun
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +10%, Attack Speed: +1\nCannot be used at the same time as Falling Moon.
primary.desc: While toggled, increases %Final Damage and Attack Speed (by 1 stage)
details: Cannot be used at the same time as
Right-clicking the skill will toggle ON/OFF the character visual stance for both Solar and Luna stance

primary.name: Falling Moon
primary.shortDesc:
Critical Rate: +10%
Number of Attacks for Skills: x2, Final Damage is decreased to 55%
Number of attacks cannot exceed 15.
Cannot be used at the same time as Rising Sun.
primary.desc: While toggled, increases %Crit Rate and doubles the number of attacks for your skills, however reduces your %Final Damage
details: Cannot be used at the same time as
Shares the same Skill Points (SP) with
Number of attacks cannot exceed 15 hits

primary.name: Solar Slash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 12, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 150%, Number of Attacks: 2
details: Solar attacks can only be used during Solar Stance

primary.name: Luna Divide
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 12, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Moon Fragment Damage: 300%, Number of Attacks: 1
primary.desc: Fires homing projectiles at nearby enemies
details: Luna attacks can only be used during Luna Stance
Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as

primary.name: Soul Element
primary.shortDesc:
When the Solar/Luna skill opposite to the previous skill that was used lands a hit, 50% chance to create 1 cosmic orb that lasts 30 sec
Max Cosmic Orb Stacks: 2, duration of all cosmic orbs reset upon creation
When cosmic orb is created, Attack Power increases by 20 for 30 sec
[Passive Effect: Ignore Enemy Defense: 10%]
primary.desc: While toggled, successfully landing an Solar/Luna attack opposite stance of the previously successful attack has a chance to grant a 'Cosmic Orb'
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Ignore DEF
Cosmic Orbs are used to empower 'Cosmic' skills

Upon creating a Cosmic Orb, grants a flat Attack buff
  • The duration of the buff and all active Cosmic Orbs are refreshed when a Cosmic Orb is created

primary.name: Soul of the Guardian
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +1500, Defense: +750, Knockback Resistance: +40%

primary.name: Inner Voice
primary.shortDesc: Speed: +40, Jump: +20, Max Speed: +20

primary.name: Soul Leap
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5. Allows you to jump a greater distance.
details: Modifies the appearance of

primary.shortDesc: Solar Slash - MP Cost: 14, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 150%, Number of Attacks: 4\nLuna Divide - MP Cost: 14, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Moon Fragment Damage: 190%, Number of Attacks: 3
details: []: Increases Max Enemies Hit and Number of Attacks
[]: Increases Max Enemies Hit and Number of Attacks, but damage per missile is reduced

primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 25, consumes all cosmic orbs and launches a dark matter.
Dark Matter - Max Enemies Pierced: 8, Damage: 160%, Number of Attacks: 2. Upon exploding, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 220%, Number of Attacks: 3
Dark Matter Damage per Cosmic Orb Consumed: +20% points
Cooldown: 15 sec
primary.desc: Launches an orb forward that damages enemies that it passes through before exploding
details:
Consumes all Cosmic Orbs to increase %p Damage of attack per each orb consumed
  • Requires at least 1 Cosmic Orb to use

primary.name: Equinox Cycle
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 35, changes stance every time Solar/Luna skills are used
Rising Sun - Final Damage: +15%, Attack Speed: +1
Falling Moon - Critical Rate: +15%, Number of Attacks: x2, Final Damage is decreased to 60%
Number of attacks cannot exceed 15.
primary.desc: While toggled, automatically change stances every time a Solar/Luna attack is used
details: Additionally, increases the amount of bonus stats provided by each stance

primary.shortDesc: Soul Element Cosmic Orb Creation Chance: 15%, Max Stacks: +1\nWhen cosmic orb is created, Bonus Attack Power: +15
details: Increases chance to create Cosmic Orb and amount of Attack provided from buff
Increases Max Stacks (by 1)

primary.shortDesc: One-Handed and Two-Handed Sword Mastery: +50%

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 40 and DEX by 20.

primary.shortDesc: Solar Slash - MP Cost: 19, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 225%, Number of Attacks: 5\nLuna Divide - MP Cost: 19, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Moon Fragment Damage: 180%, Number of Attacks: 5
details: []: Increases %Damage and Number of Attacks
[]: Increases Number of Attacks, but damage per missile is reduced

Meteor Shower Zone - Duration: 45 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 210%, Number of Attacks: 3
Meteor Shower Duration per Cosmic Orb Consumed: +3 sec
Damage Against Normal Enemies: +50%
Cooldown: 30 sec

details:
Consumes all Cosmic Orbs to increase duration of zone per each orb consumed
  • Requires at least 1 Cosmic Orb to use
Cast animation is removed when used during , , and (Styx Crossing)
Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters
Unaffected by %Summon Duration

primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Damage: 170%, Number of Attacks: 2 while moving
primary.desc: Dash forward pushing and damaging enemies in your path

primary.desc: Dash forward pushing and damaging enemies in your path
details: Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as

primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Success Rate: 100%, Enemy DEF in Range: -10%, Duration: 30 sec, final damage the enemy receives increased by 5%.

primary.shortDesc: Soul Element Cosmic Orb Creation Chance: 15%, Max Stacks: +1\nWhen cosmic orb is created, Bonus Attack Power: +15
details: Increases chance to create Cosmic Orb and amount of Attack provided from buff
Increases Max Stacks (by 1)

primary.shortDesc: Rising Sun - Final Damage: +20%, Attack Speed: +1\nFalling Moon - Critical Rate: +20%, Number of Attacks for Skills: x2, Final Damage is decreased to 75%\nNumber of attacks cannot exceed 15.

[]: Increases %Damage, Max Enemies Hit, and Number of Attacks

primary.name: Cosmic Burst
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 50, releases cosmic orb by consuming all cosmic orbs
Each of the released cosmic orbs targets 1 enemy, Damage: 400%, Number of Attacks: 4
If a single enemy gets hit with several cosmic orbs, Final Damage is decreased by 30% starting with the second orb.
Cooldown per Cosmic Orb Consumed: -1 sec
Cooldown: 15 sec
[Passive Effect: Cosmic Shower Damage: +60% points]
primary.desc: Releases all active Cosmic Orbs to seek out and damage nearby enemies
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %p Damage of

Consumes all Cosmic Orbs to reduce cooldown per each orb consumed
  • Requires at least 1 Cosmic Orb to use
Enemies hit by multiple orbs take reduced %Final Damage after the first orb
Cast animation is removed when used during , , and (Styx Crossing)
Right-clicking the skill will toggle Auto Use ON/OFF allowing , , and (Styx Crossing) to activate the skill when it is off cooldown and at max Cosmic Orb stacks
Prioritize bosses with the highest HP first
Unaffected by Damage Reflect, cooldown resets, and cooldown reduction

primary.name: Equinox Slash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Damage: 240%, Number of Attacks: 6, Enemies Hit: 7\nCooldown: 5 sec
primary.desc: Instantly dashes forward while damaging enemies in your path
details: Can only be used while is active
Can be activated while using other skills

MP Cost: 100, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 3, Chance to Incapacitate: 100%, Incapacitate Duration: 10 sec.
Stun Duration: +100% depending on damage inflicted with Impaling Rays.
After debuff, Bonus Damage: 300%, Number of Attacks: 3
Cooldown: 180 sec.
primary.desc: Impales nearby enemies causing them to be binded
details: Deals an additional hit to enemies after bind duration ends

primary.name: Soul Blessing III
primary.shortDesc: Soul Element Cosmic Orb Creation Chance: 20%, Max Stacks: +1\nWhen cosmic orb is created, Bonus Final Damage: +10%
details: Now additionally provides a %Final Damage buff when a Cosmic Orb is created
Increases chance to create Cosmic Orb
Increases Max Stacks (by 1)
Unaffected by Combat Orders

Now grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Damage

Rising Sun - Final Damage: +25%, Attack Speed: +2
Falling Moon - Critical Rate: +35%, Number of Attacks for Skills: x2, Final Damage is decreased to 90%
Number of attacks cannot exceed 15.

[]: Increases %Final Damage and now increases Attack Speed by 2
[]: Increases %Crit Rate provided and reduces %Final Damage reduction amount

Unaffected by cooldown resets

hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 400%, Number of Attacks: 6\nAfter casting, Invincibility Duration: 1.8 sec, can link with Luster Charge within 5 sec\nCooldown: 45 sec
hyperActive.desc: Dash forward damaging enemies in your path
details: Upon casting, you are briefly invincible
After casting, you can briefly use once regardless of your stance
Unaffected by cooldown reduction

hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 400%, Number of Attacks: 6\nAfter casting, Invincibility Duration: 1.8 sec, can link with Blazing Assault within 5 sec\nCooldown: 45 sec
hyperActive.desc: Dash forward damaging enemies in your path
details: Upon casting, you are briefly invincible
After casting, you can briefly use once regardless of your stance
Shares the same Skill Points (SP), Key Slot, and cooldown as
Unaffected by cooldown reduction

hyperActive.name: Glory of the Guardians
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nOnly Cygnus Knights and Mihile in the party receive the effect\nCooldown: 120 sec

fifthMain.name: Cosmos
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 500, consumes all cosmic orbs to unleash the galaxy
Galaxy Unleash: perdiocally deals 990% damage 5 times up to 12 enemies for 15 sec
Attack interval decreases per cosmic orb consumed
Cooldown: 90 sec
fifthMain.desc: Surround yourself in a swirling galaxy that continously damages enemies within it
details:
Consumes all Cosmic Orbs to reduce the time between each attack per each orb consumed
  • Requires at least 1 Cosmic Orb to use
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Rift of Damnation
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, creates max cosmic orbs upon use, Styx Crossing can be used for 40 sec
Styx Crossing - Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 830%, Number of Attacks: 5, Number of Chase Cuts: 5. Additional Ignore Enemy Defense: +20%, creates max cosmic orbs, changes stance with Equinox Cycle
Attacking with Stx Crossing cuts space to leave a rift for 10 sec
Rift - Gradually grows when it's attacked by Styx Crossing and in the end, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1150%, Number of Attacks: 6, Number of Explosions: 5
More than 2 rifts cannot be created at the same time. Rift can be created again in 5 sec after exploding. Rift disappears and explodes immediately when duration ends but damage is decreased.
Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Upon casting, grants max stacks of Cosmic Orbs and allows the usage of 'Styx Crossing' attack
details:
Styx Crossing can be used by pressing /
  • Right-clicking the skill will toggle a function ON/OFF allowing Styx Crossing to activate by using the Attack Key instead
Upon using Styx Crossing, grants max stacks of Cosmic Orbs and your stance will automatically switch during

Continuously attacking the same area with Styx Crossing will cause a rift to grow and eventually explode dealing damage
  • Up to 2 rifts can be created
  • Has a cooldown (5 secs) after shattering before another rift can be created
  • All existing rifts will explode when the duration of the skill ends, however deals reduced damage
Styx Crossing has increased %Ignore DEF and ignores Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Soul Eclipse
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, creates an eclipse, attacking up to 15 enemies 7 time(s), dealing 990% damage 40 times consecutively. Invincible during casting.\nEquinox Divide: The eclipse dissipates, triggering explosions 5 time(s) at a certain interval. Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 2750%, Number of Attacks: 15. Invincible while casting. If you use in the air, you can use it while using an attack skill in mid-air\nCooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Causes an eclipse to occur that deals damage to enemies on the map
details: You are initially invincible during casting

Pressing the Skill Key again will cause the eclipse to disappear and cause a massive explode damaging nearby enemies
  • You can invincible during this attack
  • Can be activated while using , , and (Styx Crossing)
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Flare Slash
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 80, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1210%, Number of Attacks: 7\nCooldown: 12 sec, reduced by 0.8 sec when changing stance with Equinox Cycle and and reduced by 1.5x when Styx Crossing hits.
fifthMain.desc: Periodically release an explosive attack upon successful attacks while Solar/Luna stance is active
details: Whenever your stance changes during , the cooldown is reduced
When (Styx Crossing) damages an enemy, the cooldown is reduced even further
Unaffected by Damage Reflect and cooldown reduction

details: Requires enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 830%, Number of Attacks: 6
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 830%, Number of Attacks: 6
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 45, consume all cosmic orbs to create meteor shower zone
Meteor Shower Zone - Duration: 45 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 740%, Number of Attacks: 3
Meteor Shower Duration per Cosmic Orb Consumed: +3 sec
Damage Against Normal Enemies: +50%
Cooldown: 30 sec
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: Equinox Power
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, automatically activate solar and lunar blades consecutively.\nDamage: 6500%, Number of Attacks: 5, Max Enemies Hit: 8\nCooldown: 20 sec
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

originSkill.name: Astral Blitz
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1200, invincible during casting
Chase Cut occurs 48 times which attack up to 15 enemies with 2100% damage 5 times
After that, trigger 24 Big Bang that attack up to 15 enemies for 2062% damage 7 times.
Increases final damage by 10% for 20 seconds when used
Cooldown: 360 sec

notable.name: Blazing Assault / Luster Charge - Hyper Skill
HEXA Luna Divide / Solar Slash - 6th Job

meta: Dawn Warrior is a STR warrior class part of the Cygnus Knights. What's unique about Dawn Warriors is that they have two separate stances that they use for attacking. In 4th Job, you will gain a skill that automatically swaps between forms while attacking
